segments.text: Do you have any fresh baked donuts for sale yet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They will be ready in about half an hour . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I'd like five croissants , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's going to be 3 dollars 40 cents .
segments.speaker: S2
